Classes/Application.html.name: Application
Classes/Application.html.abstract: The Application class is responsible for running your application.

Classes/Clipboard.html.name: Clipboard
Classes/Clipboard.html.abstract: Clipboard is a simple interface to share data across views

Classes/Dim.html.abstract: Describes a dimension which can be an absolute value, a percentage, fill, or a reference to a dimension of another view

Classes/Pos.html.name: Pos
Classes/Pos.html.abstract: Describes a position which can be an absolute value, a percentage, centered, or

Classes/View.html.name: View
Classes/View.html.abstract: View is the base class for all views on the screen and represents a visible element that can render itself and contains zero or more nested views.

Classes/Window.html.name: Window
Classes/Window.html.abstract: A toplevel view that draws a frame around its region and has a ContentView subview where the contents are added.

Classes/Dialog.html.name: Dialog
Classes/Dialog.html.abstract: The dialog box is a window that by default is centered and contains one or more buttons,

Classes/MessageBox.html.name: MessageBox
Classes/MessageBox.html.abstract: Message box displays a modal message to the user, with a title, a message and a series of options that the user can choose from.

Classes/ColorScheme.html.name: ColorScheme
Classes/ColorScheme.html.abstract: Color scheme definitions, cover the four colors that are typically needed

Classes/Colors.html.name: Colors
Classes/Colors.html.abstract: The default ColorSchemes for the application, there are settngs for four different

Classes/Button.html.name: Button
Classes/Button.html.abstract: Button is a view that provides an item that invokes a callback when activated.

Classes/Checkbox.html.name: Checkbox
Classes/Checkbox.html.abstract: The Checkbox View shows an on/off toggle that the user can set

Classes/FrameView.html.name: FrameView
Classes/FrameView.html.abstract: The FrameView is a container frame that draws a frame around the contents

Classes/Label.html.name: Label
Classes/Label.html.abstract: Label view, displays a string at a given position, can include multiple lines.

Classes/ListView.html.name: ListView
Classes/ListView.html.abstract: ListView is a control used to displays rows of data

Classes/MenuBarItem.html.name: MenuBarItem
Classes/MenuBarItem.html.abstract: A menu bar item contains other menu items.

Classes/ProgressBar.html.name: ProgressBar
Classes/ProgressBar.html.abstract: Progress bar can indicate progress of an activity visually.

Classes/ScrollBarView.html.name: ScrollBarView
Classes/ScrollBarView.html.abstract: ScrollBarViews are views that display a 1-character scrollbar, either horizontal or vertical
